titleStmt.title: Verae notae ecclesiae , sunt visibilis quidem, syncera verbi prædicatio, & sacramentorum administratio ... ; Vnicuique ecclesiae liberum est politiae formam institutere sibi aptam, & vtilem

notesStmt.note: Contains Latin verses related to theses at Cambridge University.
Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
